lead_paragraph: McGregor became the first man to hold two Ultimate Fighting Championship belts at the same time when he unseated lightweight champ Eddie Alvarez at Madison Square Garden.

headline.print_headline: U.F.C.’s McGregor Backs Up His Boasts
headline.main: Conor McGregor Delivers Knockout in U.F.C.’s New York Debut

snippet: McGregor became the first man to hold two Ultimate Fighting Championship belts at the same time when he unseated lightweight champ Eddie Alvarez at Madison Square Garden....
abstract:
Conor McGregor defeats Eddie Alvarez by knockout to win lightweight title bout; is first mixed martial artist to hold two Ultimate Fighting Championship belts, for both lightweight and featherweight classes; fight is part of first UFC event held in New York City after state legalized
mixed martial arts.
